nodes.text: A blade drain was a lightsaber attachment that allowed a lightsaber to absorb some of the energy held within the blade of an opponent's saber. This made the opponent's blade less powerful, but came with a risk of overloading the saber that was absorbing the energy.
Blade drains were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
